results.content: I needed a quick ramp up on NPM because I'm tasked with writing a react app.... This course gave me a good, brief introduction.  As I mostly program in Python, I was able to map a lot of the concepts to pip and setuputils.
results.content_html: I needed a quick ramp up on NPM because I'm tasked with writing a react app.... This course gave me a good, brief introduction. As I mostly program in Python, I was able to map a lot of the concepts to pip and setuputils.

results.content: Good introduction to NODE, NPM, and YARN.  Outlines the differences between NPM and YARN.
results.content_html: Good introduction to NODE, NPM, and YARN. Outlines the differences between NPM and YARN.

results.content: Most topics clearly explained and thus I now have a better handle about how npm, n, npx, packages and node functions.
